content.html:
Analyst: Students in the analyst position are starting their professional career, and provide support to consultants and project managers. Work tasks focus towards data analysis, market research, and competitive benchmarking. This role requires ~1.5 hours/week, and serves as a pipeline to our consultant and project manager roles in following semesters.

Consultant: Consultants lead the development of work deliverables and manage their group’s analysts. They synthesize industry and company research, lead modeling and process analysis, and compile insight into client presentations and reports. Time requirement is ~2 hours/week.

Project Manager: Project managers serve as team lead. They plan projects, communicate between the client and their team, distribute work, and monitor performance. Consulting, project management, or relevant experience is preferred, and a weekly time commitment of ~2 hours is required.
content.markdown:
**Analyst:** Students in the analyst position are starting their professional career, and provide support to consultants and project managers. Work tasks focus towards data analysis, market research, and competitive benchmarking. This role requires \~1.5 hours/week, and serves as a pipeline to our consultant and project manager roles in following semesters.

**Consultant:** Consultants lead the development of work deliverables and manage their group’s analysts. They synthesize industry and company research, lead modeling and process analysis, and compile insight into client presentations and reports. Time requirement is \~2 hours/week.

**Project Manager:** Project managers serve as team lead. They plan projects, communicate between the client and their team, distribute work, and monitor performance. Consulting, project management, or relevant experience is preferred, and a weekly time commitment of \~2 hours is required.

en.heading: Welcome to Pittsburgh Management Consulting.
en.subheading: At Pittsburgh Management Consulting, we inject fresh, diverse perspectives into your business. Our dynamic team of students, with varied educational backgrounds and real-world experience, is equipped to craft innovative solutions tailored to your business needs. Let us bring energy and creativity to help your business thrive.

description.html: Our clients can benefit from our financial planning consulting services, which help develop effective budgeting, forecasting, and valuation strategies. We work with you to create a tailored financial plan that helps you achieve your business goals.
description.markdown: Our clients can benefit from our financial planning consulting services, which help develop effective budgeting, forecasting, and valuation strategies. We work with you to create a tailored financial plan that helps you achieve your business goals.

description.html: Our organizational development consulting services help our clients improve their organizational culture and structure. We work with you to identify areas of improvement, develop a customized plan, and implement change to optimize your business.
description.markdown: Our organizational development consulting services help our clients improve their organizational culture and structure. We work with you to identify areas of improvement, develop a customized plan, and implement change to optimize your business.

description.html: Our tech consulting services help you leverage the latest technology solutions to improve their operations and increase revenue. We work with you to identify technology solutions that fit your business needs and help you stay ahead of the competition.
description.markdown: Our tech consulting services help you leverage the latest technology solutions to improve their operations and increase revenue. We work with you to identify technology solutions that fit your business needs and help you stay ahead of the competition.

description.html: Our marketing consulting services help our clients develop a marketing plan that drives growth and performance. We work with you to identify your target audience, create effective marketing strategies, measure your success, among other things.
description.markdown: Our marketing consulting services help our clients develop a marketing plan that drives growth and performance. We work with you to identify your target audience, create effective marketing strategies, measure your success, among other things.

description.html: Our HR consulting services help you attract, retain, and develop talent. We work with you to develop HR policies and procedures that align with your business goals and help you build a strong and productive workforce.
description.markdown: Our HR consulting services help you attract, retain, and develop talent. We work with you to develop HR policies and procedures that align with your business goals and help you build a strong and productive workforce.

description.html: Our operations consulting services help our clients optimize their operations and increase efficiency. We work with you to identify areas of improvement, streamline processes, and help you run your business more effectively.
description.markdown: Our operations consulting services help our clients optimize their operations and increase efficiency. We work with you to identify areas of improvement, streamline processes, and help you run your business more effectively.

content.html:
Pittsburgh Management Consulting

3950 Roberto Clemente Dr, Pittsburgh, PA 15260

pittsburghmanagementconsulting@gmail.com
content.markdown:
### Pittsburgh Management Consulting

3950 Roberto Clemente Dr, Pittsburgh, PA 15260

pittsburghmanagementconsulting@gmail.com

en.heading: Join Our Team
en.subheading: Welcome to Pittsburgh Management Consulting (PMC), the University of Pittsburgh’s premier student-led consulting group. Here at PMC, our members collaborate with Fortune 500 companies and local Pittsburgh businesses to craft innovative solutions for real-world business challenges.
en.subheading2: Each project team, consisting of six to eight students, engages in semester-long collaborations. Within these teams, you'll find Analysts, Consultants, and Project Managers, each playing a crucial role with unique time commitments and responsibilities.  Discover more about each role and get ready to apply for the exciting projects lined up for the next semester!
en.subheading3: Discover more about each role and apply for the exciting projects lined up for the next semester!

en.heading: Premier Student-Led Consulting
en.subheading: PMC was founded in 2022 as a branch of the Undergraduate Consulting Club - Pitt's sole resource for students interested in management and strategy consulting. The Consulting Club provides resources for motivated students, and enables them to stand out in recruiting for top consulting roles.

en.heading: We gather bright and passionate individuals from diverse backgrounds.

description.html: PMC projects are semester-long projects, finding a nice balance of agility and thoroughness. Through our engagements, our students are able to integrate themselves with their client, team, and project. However, the semester-long nature prevents stagnation in our projects, and adds a sense of urgency to our solutions.
description.markdown: PMC projects are semester-long projects, finding a nice balance of agility and thoroughness. Through our engagements, our students are able to integrate themselves with their client, team, and project. However, the semester-long nature prevents stagnation in our projects, and adds a sense of urgency to our solutions.

description.html: We are the first management consulting organization at the University of Pittsburgh. Focusing on corporate clients, we are able to affect change into firms that have a large impact on our economy and society. The opportunity to understand and network with Fortune 500s and other large companies is a unique experience for our students.
description.markdown: We are the first management consulting organization at the University of Pittsburgh. Focusing on corporate clients, we are able to affect change into firms that have a large impact on our economy and society. The opportunity to understand and network with Fortune 500s and other large companies is a unique experience for our students.

items.title: What is your association with the Consulting Club @ Pitt?

description.html: Pittsburgh Management Consulting operates as a branch of the Consulting Club @ Pitt. By utilizing the same board and resources, the Consulting Club @ Pitt complements the experiential learning offered by PMC by providing additional educational resources.
description.markdown: Pittsburgh Management Consulting operates as a branch of the Consulting Club @ Pitt. By utilizing the same board and resources, the Consulting Club @ Pitt complements the experiential learning offered by PMC by providing additional educational resources.

items.title: When do you accept new members?

description.html: We keep our recruiting rolling on a semester-basis. Each semester, we start new projects and reformulate our teams. If you are interested in joining, please look out at the end of each semester for details regarding next semester's recruiting cycle.
description.markdown: We keep our recruiting rolling on a semester-basis. Each semester, we start new projects and reformulate our teams. If you are interested in joining, please look out at the end of each semester for details regarding next semester's recruiting cycle.

en.heading: Student-Led Management Consulting.
en.subheading: Developing the next generation of business leaders at the University of Pittsburgh.

body.html: At PMC, our mission is to help businesses thrive. We do this by providing comprehensive consulting services that are tailored to the unique needs of each client. Our team is committed to delivering top-notch results that exceed expectations.
body.markdown: At PMC, our mission is to help businesses thrive. We do this by providing comprehensive consulting services that are tailored to the unique needs of each client. Our team is committed to delivering top-notch results that exceed expectations.

body.html: We offer a wide range of services at PMC, including business strategy, marketing, finance, and more. Our team has diverse backgrounds and experiences, helping business across various industries achiever their goals. Browse our past projects to learn more about what we offer.
body.markdown: We offer a wide range of services at PMC, including business strategy, marketing, finance, and more. Our team has diverse backgrounds and experiences, helping business across various industries achiever their goals. Browse our past projects to learn more about what we offer.

body.html: At PMC, we take a collaborative approach to our engagements. We work closely with clients to understand their needs and develop solutions that are tailored to their unique challenges. Our approach is hypothesis-based, results-driven, and designed to help business succeed.
body.markdown: At PMC, we take a collaborative approach to our engagements. We work closely with clients to understand their needs and develop solutions that are tailored to their unique challenges. Our approach is hypothesis-based, results-driven, and designed to help business succeed.

en.heading: Contact Us
en.subheading: We'd love to hear from you.

en.heading: Client Interest Form
en.subheading: Interested in working with us? Fill out the form below and we'll be in touch!

content.html: We are always looking to expand our team - apply now for the Fall of 2024.
content.markdown: We are always looking to expand our team - apply now for the Fall of 2024.

content.html: In collaboration with our leadership, Pitt faculty, and industry consultants, we've crafted an effective and flexible engagement approach that consistently yields positive outcomes for our clients. Keeping a pulse on the latest research and industry developments, we strive to maintain a nimble strategy that caters to the specific needs of each client. Our dedication to excellence drives us to continually enhance our methods, fostering long-term success in partnership with our clients and contributing to the growth of their businesses.
content.markdown: In collaboration with our leadership, Pitt faculty, and industry consultants, we've crafted an effective and flexible engagement approach that consistently yields positive outcomes for our clients. Keeping a pulse on the latest research and industry developments, we strive to maintain a nimble strategy that caters to the specific needs of each client. Our dedication to excellence drives us to continually enhance our methods, fostering long-term success in partnership with our clients and contributing to the growth of their businesses.

en.heading: We're passionate about providing genuine value to our clients.

subtitle.html: Our leadership and alumni board have meticulously crafted an engagement strategy that is designed to yield quality solutions in an efficient manner.
subtitle.markdown: Our leadership and alumni board have meticulously crafted an engagement strategy that is designed to yield quality solutions in an efficient manner.

subtitle.html: At PMC, we hang our hats on providing applicable and implementable solutions to businesses that will truly drive value for our clients.
subtitle.markdown: At PMC, we hang our hats on providing applicable and implementable solutions to businesses that will truly drive value for our clients.

subtitle.html: A main focus in our engagements is to establish a long-term relationship that analyzes the impact of past and potential future projects.
subtitle.markdown: A main focus in our engagements is to establish a long-term relationship that analyzes the impact of past and potential future projects.

code.html: {@html content.html}

content.html:
heading 1

Overall, our calendar software is the perfect tool for managing your time and staying organized. With its user-friendly interface and powerful search functionality, it's the ideal solution for anyone looking to take control of their schedule and make the most of their time.

heading 2

Additionally, our software integrates seamlessly with popular email services,

so that users can easily invite others and receive updates about events.

heading 3

Try it out today and see the difference for yourself. Overall, our calendar software is a comprehensive and effective tool for managing your time.

Some interesting quote info
content.markdown:
# heading 1

Overall, our calendar software is the *perfect tool* for managing your time and staying organized. With its user-friendly interface and powerful search functionality, it's the ideal solution for anyone looking to take control of their schedule and make the most of their time.

## heading 2

Additionally, our software integrates seamlessly with <mark>popular email services,</mark>

 so that users can easily invite others and receive updates about events.

### heading 3

Try it out today and see the difference for yourself. Overall, our calendar software is a comprehensive and effective tool for managing your time.

> Some interesting quote info

content.html: Our calendar software company was founded with the goal of helping people better manage their time and stay organized. We recognized that many people struggle to keep track of their busy schedules, and we wanted to provide a simple and effective solution. With our calendar software, we've created an easy-to-use tool that allows users to quickly add and view events, set reminders, and invite others to events. We've also made sure to integrate seamlessly with popular email services, so that users can easily stay connected with their colleagues and friends.
content.markdown:
Our calendar software company was founded with the goal of helping people better manage their time and stay organized. We recognized that many people struggle to keep track of their busy schedules, and we wanted to provide a simple and effective solution.
With our calendar software, we've created an easy-to-use tool that allows users to quickly add and view events, set reminders, and invite others to events. We've also made sure to integrate seamlessly with popular email services, so that users can easily stay connected with their colleagues and friends.

en.heading: We're passionate about building a better meeting workflow

content.html:
Join us on our mission

Through awareness, education, and direct action, we're working to combat climate change and protect our precious ecosystems. Together, we can make a difference.

Since our founding, we've been at the forefront of environmental conservation. Our dedicated team of scientists, activists, and volunteers works tirelessly to protect endangered species, restore critical habitats, and educate the public about the urgency of climate action.

code.html: {headline}

Our Principles

Real World Experience

Through our Consulting engagements, we intend to provide our students with invaluable hands-on experience and by solving challenging business issues.

Rigorous Education

PMC students are prepared for client engagements through our Consulting Academy. This event, sponsored by Pitt Business, teaches vital consulting principles that prepare our consultants for their client engagements.

Relevant Exposure

Our consultants are regularly exposed to business leaders and challenges that provide unique perspectives, teach lessons related to strategic thinking, and networking opportunities for our students.
